item.description:
You are invited to the Salem pug meetup !

Please come to a pug meet up at:
WagsDoggiedaycare
Iron Rail Building
91 Grapevine Road
Wenham, MA 01984
Phone: 978-468-9924
Email: wagsdoggiedaycare@yahoo.com
Owner: Lisa Kane


10am-12pm
cost between $5-10 per dog - pay at the door

Starting in November all of our meetups will be indoors until the weather allows us back outside. Lisa Kane, owner of Wags, has graciously allowed us to rent her space for the winter. The cost of the space is $100. We need to get at least 20 dogs to attend to keep the cost at the $5.00 . If we don't get 20 dogs to come, the amount will be prorated that day to make up ( cost will go up per dog ) the difference.

Please only RSVP if you are 100% sure you can make it, as I don't want the other dog owners who come to get stuck with paying too much.

I will bring the group play bag with all the wonderful toys you all contributed.

Thanks everyone, and Maizee is looking forward to seeing all her friend again!

Kristen :)

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The Salem Pug January Meetup
